channel.title: A command i've seen

item.title: A command i've seen
item.dc:creator: @Thatguy Thatguy
item.description:
@Thatguy wrote:

Ok, i was on a random server and there was a command called “vent” where whatever you said like: ::vent [message here] npcs would say what was after the command i’ve looked for it and cant find anything on it does anyone know how to make one like this?

I searched and this was the closest thing i found:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“vent”) && playerRights >= 2 && (command.length() > 5)) {

for(int I = 0; I < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; I++)
{
	if (server.npcHandler.npcs[I] != null)
	{
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].updateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdate = command.substring(5);
	}
}

} [/code]
but the guy said it didnt work

Read full topic
